Graphic Design Resumé About & Contact

Graphic Design

With my training in visual communication, I aim to share complex ideas, elucidate data, and celebrate the splendor of nature.

Public Health Review Cover

This cover won a competition for the student-led public health journal, the Public Health Review.

Skull and Flies Painting

A human skull surrounded by larger than life flies aims to explore the recycling of nutrients and energy in an ecosystem.

Whale Painting

The whale is inspired by the small colored pencil drawings of Frank Lloyd Wright.

Adaptator: An Evolution Game

This game concept explores evolution by introducing random chance into the creation of animal body plans.

Gene Editing Perspectives

A gallery installation explores what people think about gene editing technologies.

Rainbow Bricks

Each toy brick is like a brush stroke in this color composition.

Personal Protective Equipment Instructions

How do you correctly put on personal protective equipment in a hospital?

Background

Resilience Continuum is a project by Claire Nyquist which explores science through data visualization, fiction, and graphic design.
